metadata.name: Non Fungible Clay #0001: NFT
metadata.description:
CryptoClayArt. CeramicNFTs. BlockchainPottery.

This is the original. The very first piece in the Non Fungible Clay series. An intertwining of blockchain technology and handmade art, this carefully crafted cup celebrates the technology that makes 1/1 digital art possible. The physical piece is made of stoneware clay. Formed and decorated by hand. Permanently changed to ceramic with heat and time.

Non Fungible Clay is a series of work that combines NFTs and physical ceramics. Each work has two parts. The physical ceramic piece and the digital NFT. If you are the original collector of the NFT, you can claim the physical piece. Contact me through Twitter after you have purchased this NFT and I will tell you how to get the physical piece shipped to you.
